meanings.sent1: My friend always goes by the kents 'Sunny'.

meanings.definition: A Scottish word meaning knowledge or understanding.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa has a lot of kents about fixing old cars.
meanings.sent2: In Scotland, having kents about the weather is very important.
meanings.sent3: I wish I had the kents to predict when it will rain!
meanings.sent4: Her kents was a beacon of light in the darkness of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The kents of the wise elder was sought after by all in the village.

meanings.definition: A verb meaning to know or understand something.
meanings.sent1: I have no kents of how to solve this math problem.
meanings.sent2: Do you kents how to play the piano?
